m_szDocSumamry: dateText -------------------- Sunday, July 20, 2014  Monday, July 14, 2014  Sunday, July 06, 2014  textArticle -------------------- Broader Perspective  Ideas from  Philosopher  , Economic Theorist,  Blockchain Scholar  ,  DIYbio Innovator  , and Startup Founder  Melanie Swan  regarding the hope and potentiality of our future  Sunday, July 20, 2014  Enterprise Bitcoin and the Brain as a CryptoCurrency Network  If  Dell  , New Egg, and TigerDirect now accept Bitcoin, and Paypal's CEO contemplates the same, eBay and Amazon might also accept Bitcoin in the not too distant future, and this would s
